        Gets the contents from a File object
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        byte array containing the contents of the file

      • writeBytes

        public static String writeBytes(byte[] bytesToWrite,
                                String outputFilename,
                                String friendlyName)
        Writes a byte array to the specified file name.
        Parameters:
        bytesToWrite - bytes to write to the file
        outputFilename - the path name to the file
        friendlyName - a friendly name to show to the user
        Returns:
        error string or null if the file was successfully written

      • toPrintedDate

        public static String toPrintedDate(String inDate)
                            throws DateParserException
        Converts a date in the format of yyyyMMdd (20171231 to yyyyMMMdd (2017DEC31).
        Parameters:
        inDate - date in yyyyMMDD (20171231) format
        Returns:
        string with the date formated in yyyyMMMdd (2017DEC31)
        Throws:
        DateParserException - if the date is malformed and can't be parsed.

      • makeDateArray

        public static byte[] makeDateArray(String dateString)
                            throws DateParserException
        Creates an array of bytes representing YYYYMMDDhhmmssZ per SP 800-76 normative Note 4.
        Parameters:
        dateString - a string representing the date from Date()
        Returns:
        a byte array of the date appended with "Z"
        Throws:
        DateParserException - if the date is malformed and can't be parsed.

      • toShortFromBytes

        public static short toShortFromBytes(byte a,
                                     byte b)
        Converts two contiguous bytes to a short integer assuming big-endian bytes
        Parameters:
        a - assumes this is first of 2 contiguous bytes
        b - assumes this is second of 2 contiguous bytes
        Returns:
        the numeric value of a short integer

      • hexStringToByteArray

        public static byte[] hexStringToByteArray(String s)
        Converts an ASCII hex string to a byte array
        Parameters:
        s - the string to be converted
        Returns:
        a byte array containing bytes as represented by argument s

      • byteToHex

        public static String byteToHex(byte singleByte)
        Converts a single byte to an ASCII hex string
        Parameters:
        singleByte - the byte to be converted
        Returns:
        string of length two bytes representing the byte singleByte

      • bytesToHex

        public static String bytesToHex(byte[] bytes)
        Renders a byte array to a human-readable hex string
        Parameters:
        bytes - bytes to be converted
        Returns:
        a string representing the bytes in ASCII hex

      • getAlgorithmIdentifier

        public static ASN1ObjectIdentifier getAlgorithmIdentifier(String serviceName,
                                                          String name)
        Gets an ASNObjectIdentifer based on a service name and friendly OID name. Note this is not 100% reliable. For instance, "RSA" cannot be found.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - such as "MessageDigest" or "Signature"
        name - friendly name or mnemonic of the OID
        Returns:
        an ASN1ObjectIdentifier of the name or null if not found

      • backupAndRecreate

        public static File backupAndRecreate(File origFile)
        Creates a backup file of the original contents and creates a new instance the original File object
        Parameters:
        origFile - the original File object
        Returns:
        a new instance of a File object with the same name

      • getProperty

        protected static String getProperty(String key,
                                    Hashtable<String,String> properties)
                             throws NoSuchPropertyException
        Gets a property from the argument properties hash table
        Parameters:
        key - property key
        properties - properties hash table
        Returns:
        the value corresponding to the argument key
        Throws:
        NoSuchPropertyException - if the key is not found

      • valuesToBytes

        public static byte[] valuesToBytes(LinkedHashMap<Byte,byte[]> valueMap,
                                   String name,
                                   byte edcTag)
        Creates a concatenation of the values in the argument valueMap
        Parameters:
        valueMap - LinkedHashMap of tags and values
        name - Name of the container
        edcTag - Error detection code tag (normally 0xFE)
        Returns:
        a byte array representing the content to be written (and possibly signed)

      • initializeContainerDescs

        protected static HashMap<Byte,String> initializeContainerDescs()
        Initializes a convenient HashMap of tag-to-names
        Returns:
        HashMap of tags with names

      • tlvparse

        protected static byte[] tlvparse(byte[] data,
                                 int[] tagPosArray)
                          throws TlvParserException
        Parses a chunk of the TLV data starting at a given location within the data
        Parameters:
        data - the data to be parsed
        tagPosArray - location of the starting tag
        Returns:
        a byte array containing just the data corresponding to the tag and the location of the next tag (via the tagPosArray argument.
        Throws:
        TlvParserException - if unexpected end-of-data is encountered.
